mapper.select: SELECT REVIEWNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, ID, NAME, PROMOTIONNO FROM REVIEW
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEWNO, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITEDATE, ID, NAME, PROMOTIONNO) VALUES((select max(reviewNO)+1 from REVIEW), #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE , #{id}, 'review',#{promotionNO})
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, WHERE reviewNO=#{reviewNO}
